resource.http://dev.llgc.org.uk/sas/full_text: The central scene overflows borders with dead bodies, that was inspired by the battle of Hastings. <a title="La Bataille d'Hastings, Tapisserie de Bayeux" href="https://www.bayeuxmuseum.com/la-tapisserie-de-bayeux/decouvrir-la-tapisserie-de-bayeux/la-bataille-hastings/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">https://www.bayeuxmuseum.com/la-tapisserie-de-bayeux/decouvrir-la-tapisserie-de-bayeux/la-bataille-hastings/
